winkel-skin-desc: Mike's special skin for Spivey's Corner
prefs-winkel-enable-winkel-1-help: Over the next few years, we will be gradually updating the Winkel skin. Legacy Winkel will allow you to view the old version of Winkel (as of December 2019). To learn more about the updates, go to our [[mw:Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements|project page]].
winkel-opt-out-tooltip: Change your settings to go back to the old look of the skin (legacy Winkel)
winkel.css: /* All CSS here will be loaded for users of the Winkel skin */
winkel.js: /* All JavaScript here will be loaded for users of the Winkel skin */
